title: New: Honeyblood – Killer Bangs
body:
_Killer Bangs_, the new track from Glaswegian duo **Honeyblood **is razor sharp sugary rock and perfectly encapsulates the sound of these “Noisy Scottish Girls” in a neatly bound two minute package.

With straight up guitar and drums and an enormous chorus, Killer Bangs ensures **Honeyblood** will be the next fledgling young artist to fly the flag for the city.

Stream _Killer Bangs_ below:
